SamPy.db.sqlite.toLogTen¶

SamPy.db.sqlite.toLogTen(value)¶

Takes the 10th base logarithm of the given value.

Note :

This function can be passed on to slite3 connection
Parameters:
  • value (float or ndarray) – data
Returns:

math:log_{10} (value)
